description: A honeypot configuration featuring realistic, vulnerable HTTP and SSH services for attacker engagement and research. Both services simulate legacy software with well-known vulnerabilities and provide a rich set of interactive commands and endpoints to maximize realism and attacker engagement.

services.description: Vulnerable SSH service mimicking an outdated Linux server (OpenSSH_7.2p2 Ubuntu-4ubuntu2.8) with weak authentication, command injection flaws, and a simulated file system for attacker exploration.
services.cve_description: Simulates OpenSSH and libssh vulnerabilities, including weak key exchange and authentication bypass. Accepts a range of weak passwords and simulates privilege escalation and file system navigation.

commands.handler: bin  boot  dev  etc  home  lib  tmp  usr  var
